page.title: 20MOTORWAY THOUGHTS (2)
page.content: The motorway is fast and efficient,but also destuctive,slicing through fields woods and hills,filling in valleys.Pylons control the sky towering over the motorway;cattle and horses grazing calmly below.Cars,vans and lorries rushing from somewhere to anywhere.Birds perch on the pylon wires.A car,broken down at the side of the motorway,in a field a farmer ploughing,as he has for years.The motorway has changed the land in the past few years.Things have been moved,put in,brought out,sliced in half or wiped out completely.An old, abandoned farm,dirty white with cracked walls.The motorway is a noisy place in the middle of the quiet,peaceful countryside. M.Woods,J.Potter,H.Bessell,S.Clark, L.Tyler:Deanwood Jnr.Sch.Gillingham 11th July 1985.
